tidbits.title: Financial Hub
tidbits.description: The Cayman Islands are a global financial hub, known for their banking and finance sectors, offering tax advantages and a stable economy.

tidbits.title: Crystal-Clear Waters
tidbits.description: The islands boast stunning beaches with crystal-clear waters, perfect for snorkeling, diving, and exploring vibrant marine life, including colorful coral reefs.

tidbits.title: Turtle Conservation
tidbits.description: The Cayman Islands are committed to turtle conservation, with efforts to protect nesting sites and raise awareness about the endangered sea turtle species.
